# Set Up & Data Pull

Dev Needs
+ pull sprites 
  + https://pokemondb.net/sprites
  + https://veekun.com/dex/downloads

```{r load-packages}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r data-pull}
pokemon_df <- read_csv(file = here::here("data","pokemon.csv")) %>% as_tibble()
```

```{r sprite-pull}
untar(
  tarfile = here::here("imgs", "generation-1.tar.gz"),
  list = TRUE
)
```



[![Mew](https://img.pokemondb.net/sprites/red-blue/normal/mew.png)](http://pokemondb.net/pokedex/mew) 



```{r eda}
pokemon_df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = weight_kg, y = height_m)) + 
    geom_point(aes(color = as.character(generation))) + 
    geom_smooth(aes(group = as.character(generation),color = as.character(generation))) +
    facet_wrap(.~as.character(generation))
```
